hero.title: TUM Albanian
hero.subtitle: Student Society
hero.description: The official community for Albanian students at the Technical University of Munich. Fostering excellence, heritage, and connection.
hero.tagline: Uniting minds, building bridges across Munich.

events.title: Life at the Society
events.description: From academic workshops and career fairs to cultural nights and casual meetups, we curate experiences that bring the Albanian spirit to the heart of Bavaria.
events.quote: Knowledge enhances culture, and culture inspires knowledge.

international-day.subtitle: Representing Albania & Kosovo at TUM
international-day.description: We had the honor of representing Albania and Kosovo at the TUM CIT International Day, sharing our rich history, vibrant traditions, and cultural heritage with the TUM community.

highlights.0: Cultural booth showcasing Albanian and Kosovar traditions
highlights.1: Interactive presentations about our history and heritage
highlights.2: Connecting with students from diverse backgrounds

semester-party.subtitle: Kick Off the Semester in Style
semester-party.description: Join us to celebrate the start of the new semester! Bring your friends and enjoy an evening of music, drinks, and good vibes with the Albanian student community.

student-dialogue.subtitle: Discussion with Prof. Dr. Albena Reshitaj
student-dialogue.description: An exclusive dialogue with Prof. Dr. Albena Reshitaj (Professor of Medicine & MP). Engage in an open discussion about academic challenges, expertise, and perspectives for students in the diaspora.

highlights.2: Perspectives on being a student in the diaspora

student-dialogue.audience: Open to all students interested in discussing academic life and challenges in the diaspora.

albuddy.title: Munich ALBuddy Program
albuddy.description: A mentorship network connecting new Albanian and Kosovar students with experienced mentors at TUM, LMU, and Hochschule München.

kafeneja.title: Kafeneja Jonë: Coffee & Chats
kafeneja.description: Regular coffee meetups for Albanian students to connect and socialize in a relaxed atmosphere at TUM.

details.interestedDescription: We're always looking for motivated students to join our projects and make a difference in the community.

albuddy.longDescription: The Munich ALBuddy Program is a mentorship network for Albanian and Kosovar students at TUM, LMU, and Hochschule München. We connect new students (mentees) with experienced mentors who help navigate everything from academics to finding the best food in Munich.

0.title: Connect Mentees & Mentors
0.description: Match new students with experienced students ready to help.

1.title: Academic Support
1.description: Guidance on course selection, study techniques, and campus resources.

2.title: Life in Munich
2.description: Help with housing, transportation, and discovering the best spots in the city.

0.title: Register
0.description: Sign up as a mentee or mentor through our registration form.

1.title: Get Matched
1.description: We pair you based on your university, program, and interests.

2.title: Connect & Grow
2.description: Meet your buddy and start building a lasting connection.

kafeneja.longDescription: Kafeneja Jonë (Our Coffee Shop) is a regular coffee meetup where Albanian students gather to take a break from studies, chat, and connect in a relaxed atmosphere. It's a casual way to build friendships and feel at home in Munich.

0.title: Social Connection
0.description: Create a relaxed space for Albanian students to meet and socialize.

1.title: Community Building
1.description: Foster friendships and a sense of belonging among students.

2.title: Regular Meetups
2.description: Establish a consistent gathering spot for the Albanian student community.

0.title: Show Up
0.description: Just come to the cafe at the scheduled time - no registration needed.

1.title: Grab a Coffee
1.description: Order your favorite drink and find a spot with the group.

2.title: Connect
2.description: Chat, relax, and get to know fellow Albanian students.

team.title: Our Board
team.description: Meet the dedicated students working behind the scenes to make the society a home for everyone. We are always looking for new volunteers.

about.title: About the Society
about.lead: Established in 2024, the TUM Albanian Student Society serves as the primary hub for Albanian students pursuing their studies at one of Europe's leading technical universities.
about.mission: Our mission is threefold: to Support, to Connect, and to Represent. We provide academic resources and mentorship for incoming students, creating a soft landing in Munich. We organize social events that build lifelong friendships. And we represent our vibrant culture within the international atmosphere of TUM.
about.vision: We envision a thriving community where every Albanian student at TUM feels empowered to achieve their academic goals while staying connected to their roots.
about.quote: Unity is power; without unity there is no strength.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message for partnerships, membership inquiries, or just to say Përshëndetje.
contact.name: Name

footer.description: Connecting students, celebrating heritage, and fostering future leaders at the Technical University of Munich.
